TopicTitle: [ModRequest] Mod like FAR's debug voxels, Debug Stuff, F12 etc that focuses on phantom forces and visualizes them like f12 aero overlay.

Articles.Content:
Designing new spaceplanes with my bunch of mods is a nightmare of "Spawn on runway and spin rapidly to the right and explode from weird phantom forces". My rule of thumb about tail/bicouplers turns out not to be a universal fix and iterating over every single part by reverting to hangar is... tedious with the load screens.

 

So I wonder if there might be a mod or someone capable of making one that creates an overlay like the "F12" or FAR displays that'd show such forces and highlight parts that generate these forces. 

 

I tried "Debug Stuff", but it is not helpful for my debugging purposes.
